vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἄστοργ-ος, ον,
without natural affection, ἄστοργος ψυχήν[Refs 4th c.BC+]the heartless one, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἄ. θάνατος cruel, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 without attraction, [Refs 1st c.AD+]:—also ἀστόργης (sic) [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
without love, heartless
devoid of natural, or instinctive affection, without love, without affection to kindred, Rom. 1:31; 2Tim. 3:3*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: insensible, falto de afecto humano normal, inhumano
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 硬心, 冷漠, 不為別人著想的 (羅1:31; 提後3:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 硬心, 冷漠, 不为别人着想的 (罗1:31; 提后3:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không có tình nghĩa tự nhiên
